title: Google\Cloud\Video\Transcoder\V1beta1\Overlay\AnimationStatic
name: AnimationStatic
description:
Display static overlay object.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.video.transcoder.v1beta1.Overlay.AnimationStatic

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.xy
params.description: Normalized coordinates based on output video resolution. Valid values: 0.0–1.0. xy is the upper-left coordinate of the overlay object. For example, use the x and y coordinates {0,0} to position the top-left corner of the overlay animation in the top-left corner of the output video.

params.name: data.start_time_offset
params.description: The time to start displaying the overlay object, in seconds. Default: 0
